about_the_game:
Centuries of living in darkness have robbed your tribe of sight, but in return, you have gained extraordinary hearing. After a tragic turning point in your tribe’s history, you must venture into uncharted caverns filled with monstrous threats. Armed only with a whip and your ability to "see" through sound, you must fight, adapt, and survive in this treacherous new world.

Key Features

  • Echolocation-Based Gameplay – Navigate pitch-black environments by generating sound waves that reveal your surroundings. Every movement, crack of your whip, or environmental noise helps you visualize the world around you.

  • Sound Sensitivity – While sound is your greatest asset, too much noise can overwhelm your senses. Use your whip wisely, or risk temporary deafness in the heat of battle.

  • Whip Combat & Mobility – Your whip isn't just a weapon; it's a tool for traversal. Swing across chasms, disarm enemies, and strike with precision to gain the upper hand.

  • Unique Monsters & Adaptive AI – Encounter cave-dwelling creatures with distinct behaviors. Learn their weaknesses and adapt your tactics to survive.

  • Challenging Environments – Explore a vast, interconnected cave system filled with hidden dangers, environmental hazards, and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Will you master the darkness, or will it consume you?

short_description: What lurks in the dark? Only the echoes know. Use your trusty whip to navigate the unforgiving depths, swing across the abyss and fight the living horrors that lie within.
